GameOverActivity
Riches await you in the jungle, but so does danger. Tap on the screen to collect treasure. If Medusa appears, close your eyes!
How to win the game: To win, you need to defeat a monster. To attack, click on the screen repeatedly. The enemy\'s health remaining is shown in a bar at the top of screen.
Help has arrived! The King will now appear to help you on occasion. While he is on the screen, more hearts and better treasure will appear, and the value of all treasure is doubled.
Death, the final enemy, has arrived. If you smile at Death, it cannot harm you.
